sourcing.instructions: B: Local metal supplier; Er: Specialty rare earth metal distributor; Gd: Online chemical supplier; Mo: Industrial metal supplier.
steps: B: Local metal supplier; Er: Specialty rare earth metal distributor; Gd: Online chemical supplier; Mo: Industrial metal supplier.
1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 2. Mix B, Er, Gd, and Mo in a clean, dry container. 3. Use a mechanical mixer for 10 minutes.
